string-array.name: usefull1
string-array.item: Custom Text
Custom Reply to Contact
History
Specific List Reply
Schedule Auto Reply
Reply Frequency

string-array.name: Details1
string-array.item: Manually Auto Reply ON/OFF
In Setting -) Schedule the time.
Custom text reply.
Group Reply ON/OFF
Respond only once every custom days for each contact or group.
In Custom -) Reply to Everyone or Custom List.Also Create List for group for contact or group.
Specific Custom Reply for Individual contact or Group.
See the example click on text button from History tab.
In History -) Test Auto Reply.See recently sent message with incoming messages.

string-array.name: usefull2
string-array.item: Awesome face made by Symbol.
Emotion Attached

string-array.name: Details2
string-array.item: See Awesome face with some emotion.
It all made by different font or symbol.
Directly forward to Schedule section.
Also Copy, Share that.

string-array.name: usefull3
string-array.item: Category : Greeting, Sales, Promotion, Love, Romantic, WishBox, Shayari, Motivation, Festival, Inspiration, Sad.
Choose on of that and Share.
Also Copy and Share which you like.

string-array.name: Details3
string-array.item: Direct Set to Schedule Or Status.
Lots useful type of message.

string-array.name: usefull4
string-array.item: Sending messages without saving his/her number.

string-array.name: Details4
string-array.item: Enter WA number or pick from the contact list.
Choose quick message and type any text if you want.
From here you can go to Caption, Ascii, Quick Replies, Text Repeater, Design text.
You can set this chat to Schedule messages.
See recent activity of direct chat.

string-array.name: usefull5
string-array.item: Design Name or Caption.
Font Change

string-array.name: Details5
string-array.item: Type which name or text you want to design.
Scroll down and choose one of that.
You can forward it Schedule chat section.

string-array.name: usefull6
string-array.item: Most useful messages
Repeatedly send messages
Available in three language.
You can also add your own.

string-array.name: Details6
string-array.item: In Category -) Random most useful message list
Here you can copy and share this message with your friends or customer.
In Saved -) This is custom list which you can make.
By clicking this \'+\' icon you find a form for adding new quick message in Saved list.
Also there are multiple language for quick message.
This quick message you can find everywhere where you see any input message box.
By choosing you can see different language list here.

string-array.name: usefull7
string-array.item: See deleted Message
Media Recover
Custom ON/OFF

string-array.name: Details7
string-array.item: In Message -) Here you can find message of individual chat.
But you have to compare those deleted messages with your chats.
Delete all data by clicking \'Clear All\' button.
In Media -) Here you can find deleted media file.
Like Images, Videos, Documents, Voice notes, Audio files.
You can see predicted sender name .
Share this message.

string-array.name: usefull8
string-array.item: Download Easily
Share Directly

string-array.name: Details8
string-array.item: In Status -) Here you found Image and Video statuses.
By tapping \'Download\' button you can download this in your phone.
In Downloaded -) Here you see list of downloaded file.

string-array.name: usefull9
string-array.item: Status Schedule
Schedule Chat
Message using text function
Attach Multiple Media
History

string-array.name: Details9
string-array.item: There is two function \'Status Schedule\' and \'Schedule Chat\'.
Status Schedule -) You can set Images, Videos, Text function, caption.Also type any text for status.
Set date and time for auto Status.
Schedule Chat -) Here you can schedule chat.
You can use media file like Images, Videos, Music, Document, Text function, caption.
All view Selected file in this list.
Set date and time for sending Schedule chat.
Here you found history for all activity.
Test\n You can test it.

string-array.name: usefull10
string-array.item: Custom Text
Repeat Max 5000 times
Direct forward

string-array.name: Details10
string-array.item: Here you type any text which you want to repeat it.
Enter repeat number(max 5000 times) and click on convert button.
Also you can copy and share.

string-array.name: usefull11
string-array.item: Seen like offline
Messages Read
Also Media
Custom Switch
Notification On/Off

string-array.name: Details11
string-array.item: Manually ON/OFF.
In Message -) See messages here with individual chat list.
You can read unseen message.(Your friend can\'t see blue double tick.
Also clear all message by clicking \'Clear All\' button.
In Media -) Show unseen media file here.
See Images, Videos, Audio, Documents, Voice note, Sticker list here. Tap on that file to full view.
You can see sender name by prediction.
In Setting -) Enable Notification
Show media file ON/OFF

string-array.name: usefull12
string-array.item: Dark mode Chat
Keyboard lock
Toggle Or Menu button On/Off

string-array.name: Details12
string-array.item: Here you easily Log In Log out.
Also lock the keyboard.
You can turn on dark mode.

string-array.name: usefull13
string-array.item: Voice Call Block
Video Call Block
Schedule Call Block.
Call block to custom list.

string-array.name: Details13
string-array.item: Individually voice call and video call block.
You can create a custom list to block calls or without this custom list.
Call block to \'All Contact\',\'Except phone contact\', \'Custom list\', \'Except custom list\'.
You can also see the history of blocked calls.
